During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.

Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name:
Aviations Support Team
航空支援隊
skills.text: 1. During battle, if [Airstrike] hits, obtains a [Special Airstrike] that deals 40% damage.If used or not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected.This [Special Airstrike] will flood the target, applying [Inhibited] for 20 seconds.If Kaga is in the same Fleet, flood duration will refresh once.

skills.name:
Precision Bombing - Akagi
精密爆撃 · 赤城
skills.text: 1. During battle, prioritizes enemy Flagship.2. The higher the enemy's HP, the more [Airstrike] damage Akagi deals, up to 20%.

skills.name:
First Strike Doctrine- Offensive
先攻重視 · 攻
skills.text: 1. In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 150% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost.2. All Airgroups gain 20% more HP.

comment: A princess from a passionate and proud warrior family. Takes failure in stride. Has a hard time dealing with complicated situations due to her straightforward personality.
